content: this little basket of pumpkins unfolds into the cutest pumpkin coasters they are the perfect autumn home decor to decorate your table while protecting it from spills and condensation this pattern has been written for two sizes so you can use it for your teacup mugs or even with wine glasses what s included in the pdf file pumpkin patch coaster written pattern teacup and mug sized mini basket written pattern fits up to 2 teacup and 2 mug coasters features crochet charts for most steps print-friendly pages tester lookbook this pattern bundle has been thoroughly tested written in us terminology skill level intermediate includes crochet charts process photos and a comprehensive video tutorial sizes teacup 3 inch base 5 5 inches with pumpkins mug 3 75 inch base 6 inches with pumpkins basket 3 5 inch base 2 inch sides 4 5 inch diameter on top materials hook us 4mm/g-6 and us 4 5/us 7 yarn dk #3 for pumpkin and stem 2 colors i used brown and orange worsted weight #4 2-3 colors for coaster i used green and beige and basket i used rust scissors tapestry needle project length 3-15 hours depending on skill level - this number was determined by surveying testers this pattern is for personal use only the pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted for sale or free over the internet or offline finished pieces may be sold in small quantities as long as you credit the designer @knotfastfashion mass production is strictly prohibited please do not post tutorial videos youtube reels tiktok etc or create patterns modified from this pattern without my expressed permission all photos of the pattern have been watermarked for my protection thank you for understanding note this pattern has updated formatting compared to previous coaster patterns due to changes in pattern layout and graphic style
